chargeHist.descr: 1st Degree Child Sex Assault - Sexual Contact with Person under Age of 13

result.execSummary:
The defendant Sheldon Jules Thayer was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 4th Degree Sexual Assault, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3m).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Subject to Good Time & Work Release.

miscConds.notes: $265.60 fine/cost to be paid to Probation while on Probation.  Failure to pay may result in civil judgment.
Subject to Work Release.  NOT subject to Good Time.
Must register as a Sex Offender for 15 years

timeConds.notes:
**Must serve 17 days & 103 days are banked if violates.
**Time served.

Defendant Sheldon Jules Thayer in court with attorney Brian Thomas Smestad.  Defendant Sheldon Jules Thayer in custody.  Daniel P. Steffen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KK Clerk 3:35PM CASES:  14CF250 and 14CF258.  Filed amended information on both files.  Joint recommendation between parties.  Defendant waives right for PSI.  Defendant may not use/possess firearms or body armor.  May not vote until civil rights are restored.  Voting rights may be different with tribe - may speak with tribe about those rights.  May not hold public office while on status.  If not US citizen may face deportation or other civil rights may also be losted.  Def enters plea of G to 14CF250 count 1 amended charge.  Def enters plea of G to count 1 in 14CF258 amended charge. Court - accepts pleas of G.  14CF250  

14CF250 - Count 1 -  G is received.  Stop short of enter judgment and enters DJOC.  24 months beginning once released from custody (prison).   If def follows agreement may dismiss matter once agreement is successfully completed.  If agreement is revoked defendant will need to registry as Sex Offender for 15 years.  Sex Offender assessment and comply with recommendations.  Bound by non-monetary conditions of bond.  Must pay the $150 DJOC fee to the DA Office.    

14CF258 - Count 1 - G is received.  Finds G.  Eligible for SA and Eligible for CIP.  If Probation finds that he is not eligible they are to notify. the court.  SENTENCE:  s/withheld.  5 years Probation run concurrent with Burnett County Case.  AODA and comply.  No contacts with following:  L.M. 5/25/01, Karrie Mosay, J.M. , S.M.J 10/09/96,  M.O.M 12/08/05 this is subject through Probation.  DNA sample - no surcharge.  No Court Costs.  Sex offender treatment as prescribed and follow through. Undergo Compas and follow through.  1 year conditional time banked for use of Probation - Not subject to GT but Subject to WR.  Sentence credit of 72 days.  Absolute Sobriety.
